title: Begotten Home
setup: Stones grind underneath the frail ship as it beaches upon the artic shores. This place is stark, yet full of malice - it air itself whips you with frozen tendrils; this place will be your new home.

Nearly 4 months have passed since you fled your home, you disciples fervent, but fearful. The old country had no room for new ideas - only old men and thier old, decrepit ways: too afraid to abandon thier temples; too stubborn to reason with.

But in this place, hope can begin. No longer will you be bound by outdated laws and corrupt rulers; you shall build a new world, and a new dawn shall kiss upon your brows such wonders as yet to be known by all the world.
decision: Where will you build your temple?

choices.name: By Water
choices.summary: You shall praise the sea; dance with it's rage, and fear its frozen depths.

choices.name: By Wood
choices.summary: You shall praise the forest; meditate with nature, and find peace amongst stoic rock and timber.

choices.name: By Windswept Hills
choices.summary: You shall praise the earth; strike hard the rock, and cradle treasures found deep below.
